content.description: The crux is around the middle of the route.  But the route could be improved with a fixed bolt or two in the general center of the climb.  Currently one wonders right and then left for gear (has been TRed, probably easy 5.10).  The best line would go straight up.  Both routes were put up on the same day.
content.protection: Basic trad rack.  There is no fixed gear, build your own anchor.
content.location: The route is in the best crack feature right of Joker.  Walk off the back side.

content.description: Climb the corner with the crux in the center of the route off smaller gear.
content.protection: Basic trad rack.  There is no fixed gear at this point, build your own anchor.
content.location: The route is in the obvious left facing corner on the left side of the cliff.  Walk off the back side.

content.description: This is a small cliff line left and east of the Sugar Bowl.  It is west facing, secluded and the rock is good, especially for the Dona Ana mountains.
